associateappblockbuilderappblock.name: AssociateAppBlockBuilderAppBlock
associateappblockbuilderappblock.description: Grants permission to associate the specified app block builder with the app block

associateapplicationfleet.name: AssociateApplicationFleet
associateapplicationfleet.description: Grants permission to associate the specified application with the fleet

associateapplicationtoentitlement.name: AssociateApplicationToEntitlement
associateapplicationtoentitlement.description: Grants permission to associate the specified application to the specified entitlement

associatefleet.name: AssociateFleet
associatefleet.description: Grants permission to associate the specified fleet with the specified stack

batchassociateuserstack.name: BatchAssociateUserStack
batchassociateuserstack.description: Grants permission to associate the specified users with the specified stacks. Users in a user pool cannot be assigned to stacks with fleets that are joined to an Active Directory domain

batchdisassociateuserstack.name: BatchDisassociateUserStack
batchdisassociateuserstack.description: Grants permission to disassociate the specified users from the specified stacks

copyimage.name: CopyImage
copyimage.description: Grants permission to copy the specified image within the same Region or to a new Region within the same AWS account

createappblock.name: CreateAppBlock
createappblock.description: Grants permission to create an app block. App blocks store details about the virtual hard disk that contains the files for the application in an S3 bucket. It also stores the setup script with details about how to mount the virtual hard disk. App blocks are only supported for Elastic fleets

createappblockbuilder.name: CreateAppBlockBuilder
createappblockbuilder.description: Grants permission to create an app block builder. An app block builder is a virtual machine that is used to create an app block

createappblockbuilderstreamingurl.name: CreateAppBlockBuilderStreamingURL
createappblockbuilderstreamingurl.description: Grants permission to create a URL to start an app block builder streaming session

createapplication.name: CreateApplication
createapplication.description: Grants permission to create an application within customer account. Applications store the details about how to launch applications on streaming instances. This is only supported for Elastic fleets

createdirectoryconfig.name: CreateDirectoryConfig
createdirectoryconfig.description: Grants permission to create a Directory Config object in AppStream 2.0. This object includes the configuration information required to join fleets and image builders to Microsoft Active Directory domains

createentitlement.name: CreateEntitlement
createentitlement.description: Grants permission to create an entitlement to control access to applications based on user attributes

createfleet.name: CreateFleet
createfleet.description: Grants permission to create a fleet. A fleet is a group of streaming instances from which applications are launched and streamed to users

createimagebuilder.name: CreateImageBuilder
createimagebuilder.description: Grants permission to create an image builder. An image builder is a virtual machine that is used to create an image

createimagebuilderstreamingurl.name: CreateImageBuilderStreamingURL
createimagebuilderstreamingurl.description: Grants permission to create a URL to start an image builder streaming session

createstack.name: CreateStack
createstack.description: Grants permission to create a stack to start streaming applications to users. A stack consists of an associated fleet, user access policies, and storage configurations

createstreamingurl.name: CreateStreamingURL
createstreamingurl.description: Grants permission to create a temporary URL to start an AppStream 2.0 streaming session for the specified user. A streaming URL enables application streaming to be tested without user setup

createthemeforstack.name: CreateThemeForStack
createthemeforstack.description: Grants permission to create a custom branding theme, which might includes a custom logo, website links, and other branding to display to your users

createupdatedimage.name: CreateUpdatedImage
createupdatedimage.description: Grants permission to update an existing image within customer account

createusagereportsubscription.name: CreateUsageReportSubscription
createusagereportsubscription.description: Grants permission to create a usage report subscription. Usage reports are generated daily

createuser.name: CreateUser
createuser.description: Grants permission to create a new user in the user pool

deleteappblock.name: DeleteAppBlock
deleteappblock.description: Grants permission to delete the specified app block

deleteappblockbuilder.name: DeleteAppBlockBuilder
deleteappblockbuilder.description: Grants permission to delete the specified app block builder and release capacity

deleteapplication.name: DeleteApplication
deleteapplication.description: Grants permission to delete the specified application

deletedirectoryconfig.name: DeleteDirectoryConfig
deletedirectoryconfig.description: Grants permission to delete the specified Directory Config object from AppStream 2.0. This object includes the configuration information required to join fleets and image builders to Microsoft Active Directory domains

deleteentitlement.name: DeleteEntitlement
deleteentitlement.description: Grants permission to delete the specified entitlement

deletefleet.name: DeleteFleet
deletefleet.description: Grants permission to delete the specified fleet

deleteimage.name: DeleteImage
deleteimage.description: Grants permission to delete the specified image. An image cannot be deleted when it is in use

deleteimagebuilder.name: DeleteImageBuilder
deleteimagebuilder.description: Grants permission to delete the specified image builder and release capacity

deleteimagepermissions.name: DeleteImagePermissions
deleteimagepermissions.description: Grants permission to delete permissions for the specified private image

deletestack.name: DeleteStack
deletestack.description: Grants permission to delete the specified stack. After the stack is deleted, the application streaming environment provided by the stack is no longer available to users. Also, any reservations made for application streaming sessions for the stack are released

deletethemeforstack.name: DeleteThemeForStack
deletethemeforstack.description: Grants permission to delete a custom branding theme, which might includes a custom logo, website links, and other branding to display to your users

deleteusagereportsubscription.name: DeleteUsageReportSubscription
deleteusagereportsubscription.description: Grants permission to disable usage report generation

deleteuser.name: DeleteUser
deleteuser.description: Grants permission to delete a user from the user pool

describeappblockbuilderappblockassociati.name: DescribeAppBlockBuilderAppBlockAssociations
describeappblockbuilderappblockassociati.description: Grants permission to retrieve the associations that are associated with the specified app block builder or app block

describeappblockbuilders.name: DescribeAppBlockBuilders
describeappblockbuilders.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified app block builders, if the app block builder names are provided. Otherwise, all app block builders in the account are described

describeappblocks.name: DescribeAppBlocks
describeappblocks.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified app blocks, if the app block arns are provided. Otherwise, all app blocks in the account are described

describeapplicationfleetassociations.name: DescribeApplicationFleetAssociations
describeapplicationfleetassociations.description: Grants permission to retrieve the associations that are associated with the specified application or fleet

describeapplications.name: DescribeApplications
describeapplications.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified applications, if the application arns are provided. Otherwise, all applications in the account are described

describedirectoryconfigs.name: DescribeDirectoryConfigs
describedirectoryconfigs.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified Directory Config objects for AppStream 2.0, if the names for these objects are provided. Otherwise, all Directory Config objects in the account are described. This object includes the configuration information required to join fleets and image builders to Microsoft Active Directory domains

describeentitlements.name: DescribeEntitlements
describeentitlements.description: Grants permission to retrieve one or all entitlements for the specified stack

describefleets.name: DescribeFleets
describefleets.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified fleets, if the fleet names are provided. Otherwise, all fleets in the account are described

describeimagebuilders.name: DescribeImageBuilders
describeimagebuilders.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified image builders, if the image builder names are provided. Otherwise, all image builders in the account are described

describeimagepermissions.name: DescribeImagePermissions
describeimagepermissions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes the permissions for shared AWS account IDs on a private image that you own

describeimages.name: DescribeImages
describeimages.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified images, if the image names or image ARNs are provided. Otherwise, all images in the account are described

describesessions.name: DescribeSessions
describesessions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes the streaming sessions for the specified stack and fleet. If a user ID is provided for the stack and fleet, only the streaming sessions for that user are described

describestacks.name: DescribeStacks
describestacks.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more specified stacks, if the stack names are provided. Otherwise, all stacks in the account are described

describethemeforstack.name: DescribeThemeForStack
describethemeforstack.description: Grants permission to get the custom branding theme information, which might includes a custom logo, website links, and other branding to display to your users

describeusagereportsubscriptions.name: DescribeUsageReportSubscriptions
describeusagereportsubscriptions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes one or more usage report subscriptions

describeuserstackassociations.name: DescribeUserStackAssociations
describeuserstackassociations.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes the UserStackAssociation objects

describeusers.name: DescribeUsers
describeusers.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list that describes users in the user pool

disableuser.name: DisableUser
disableuser.description: Grants permission to disable the specified user in the user pool. This action does not delete the user

disassociateappblockbuilderappblock.name: DisassociateAppBlockBuilderAppBlock
disassociateappblockbuilderappblock.description: Grants permission to disassociate the specified app block builder with the app block

disassociateapplicationfleet.name: DisassociateApplicationFleet
disassociateapplicationfleet.description: Grants permission to disassociate the specified application from the specified fleet

disassociateapplicationfromentitlement.name: DisassociateApplicationFromEntitlement
disassociateapplicationfromentitlement.description: Grants permission to disassociate the specified application from the specified entitlement

disassociatefleet.name: DisassociateFleet
disassociatefleet.description: Grants permission to disassociate the specified fleet from the specified stack

enableuser.name: EnableUser
enableuser.description: Grants permission to enable a user in the user pool

expiresession.name: ExpireSession
expiresession.description: Grants permission to immediately stop the specified streaming session

listassociatedfleets.name: ListAssociatedFleets
listassociatedfleets.description: Grants permission to retrieve the name of the fleet that is associated with the specified stack

listassociatedstacks.name: ListAssociatedStacks
listassociatedstacks.description: Grants permission to retrieve the name of the stack with which the specified fleet is associated

listentitledapplications.name: ListEntitledApplications
listentitledapplications.description: Grants permission to retrieve the applications that are associated with the specified entitlement

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of all tags for the specified AppStream 2.0 resource. The following resources can be tagged: Image builders, images, fleets, and stacks

startappblockbuilder.name: StartAppBlockBuilder
startappblockbuilder.description: Grants permission to start the specified app block builder

startfleet.name: StartFleet
startfleet.description: Grants permission to start the specified fleet

startimagebuilder.name: StartImageBuilder
startimagebuilder.description: Grants permission to start the specified image builder

stopappblockbuilder.name: StopAppBlockBuilder
stopappblockbuilder.description: Grants permission to stop the specified app block builder

stopfleet.name: StopFleet
stopfleet.description: Grants permission to stop the specified fleet

stopimagebuilder.name: StopImageBuilder
stopimagebuilder.description: Grants permission to stop the specified image builder

stream.name: Stream
stream.description: Grants permission to federated users to sign in by using their existing credentials and stream applications from the specified stack

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite one or more tags for the specified AppStream 2.0 resource. The following resources can be tagged: Image builders, images, fleets, stacks, app blocks and applications

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to disassociate one or more tags from the specified AppStream 2.0 resource

updateappblockbuilder.name: UpdateAppBlockBuilder
updateappblockbuilder.description: Grants permission to update a specific app block builder. An app block builder is a virtual machine that is used to create an app block

updateapplication.name: UpdateApplication
updateapplication.description: Grants permission to update the specified fields for the specified application

updatedirectoryconfig.name: UpdateDirectoryConfig
updatedirectoryconfig.description: Grants permission to update the specified Directory Config object in AppStream 2.0. This object includes the configuration information required to join fleets and image builders to Microsoft Active Directory domains

updateentitlement.name: UpdateEntitlement
updateentitlement.description: Grants permission to update the specified fields for the specified entitlement

updatefleet.name: UpdateFleet
updatefleet.description: Grants permission to update the specified fleet. All attributes except the fleet name can be updated when the fleet is in the STOPPED state

updateimagepermissions.name: UpdateImagePermissions
updateimagepermissions.description: Grants permission to add or update permissions for the specified private image

updatestack.name: UpdateStack
updatestack.description: Grants permission to update the specified fields for the specified stack

updatethemeforstack.name: UpdateThemeForStack
updatethemeforstack.description: Grants permission to update the custom branding theme information, which might includes a custom logo, website links, and other branding to display to your users
